references.paper_title: Learning taxonomy adaptation in large-scale classification
references.reason: This paper provides a theoretical foundation for analyzing generalization error in hierarchical classification, which is highly relevant to the tree-structured retriever models analyzed in this paper.

references.paper_title: Deep neural networks for youtube recommendations
references.reason: This paper introduces the two-stage recommendation system architecture, which is the central focus of this paper.
This paper introduces the tree-structured retriever model, a key component of the two-stage recommender system studied in this paper.

references.paper_title: On component interactions in two-stage recommender systems
references.reason: This paper provides a theoretical analysis of two-stage recommender systems, which is highly relevant to the analysis presented in this paper.

references.paper_title: Generalization error bounds for extreme multi-class classification
references.reason: This paper provides generalization error bounds for extreme multi-class classification, which is relevant to the analysis of the ranker models in this paper.
